name: E-Sekai (ChanChan Games)
description:
After a shitty breakup with his womanizer boyfriend, Alice is isekai to a game she was playing because of an anonymous email link she clicked. 

CUSTOM NAME

*10KWORDS       

*2CG ART            

*1 ROUTE WITH 2 ENDINGS

*There may be strong language in game

*This game is done in one month for a jam, please respect that.
